Name: The Spirit Of Rock
Ingredients: 50 ml Strucchi Red Bitter (Campari-style liqueur) infused with red florina pepper
50 ml Tangerine / Mandarin / Clementine juice (fresh juice)
10 ml Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or Egg white (pasteurised) or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: POUR the pepper-infused Campari, mandarin juice and chickpea water into a mixing tin, BLEND with a hand-held electronic whisk and pour into ice-filled glass. Top with gin and tonic float.
History: Created by Yiannis Samaras in Greece for Campari.
Nutrition: One serving of The Spirit Of Rock contains 208 calories
